resources.string:
Basic Attack = 75 ~ 100 damage, 100% hit chance, plus 25 mana

 Full Slash = 200 ~ 300 damage, 50% hit chance, minus 50 mana

 Charged Attack = 150 ~ 200 damage, 100% hit chance, minus 25 mana

 Stun = 30 ~ 50 damage, 50% chance to stun enemies for 2 turns, minus 25 mana



 Both character each have the same movesets
